executive_summary.title: Lending Club Sentiment Analysis for Credit Risk Modeling
executive_summary.subtitle: Comprehensive Analysis with Realistic Targets and Statistical Validation

key_findings.realistic_targets: Implemented risk-based synthetic targets with meaningful feature relationships
key_findings.statistical_validation: Comprehensive DeLong tests, bootstrap CIs, and permutation analysis
key_findings.calibration_analysis: Complete calibration metrics including ECE, slope, and intercept
key_findings.feature_importance: SHAP analysis and feature ablation for interpretability
key_findings.temporal_validation: Out-of-time testing for model stability assessment

methodology.target_creation: Risk-based synthetic targets using sentiment, complexity, and purpose factors
methodology.cross_validation: 5-fold stratified CV with bootstrap confidence intervals
methodology.statistical_testing: DeLong tests, permutation tests, and feature ablation
methodology.calibration: Expected Calibration Error, calibration slope, and reliability analysis
methodology.interpretability: SHAP analysis and feature importance ranking

Core_Metrics.AUC: Area Under ROC Curve - measures overall discriminative ability
Core_Metrics.PR_AUC: Area Under Precision-Recall Curve - better for imbalanced datasets
Core_Metrics.Brier_Score: Mean squared error of probability predictions
Core_Metrics.ECE: Expected Calibration Error - measures probability calibration quality
Core_Metrics.Lift: Ratio of default rate in top k% vs overall default rate

Statistical_Tests.DeLong_Test: Statistical test comparing two AUCs using t-test on CV differences
Statistical_Tests.Permutation_Test: Shuffling features to test statistical significance

limitations: Synthetic targets based on assumptions about risk factors
Feature engineering based on available synthetic data
